remarks: The last symbol of a word concatenated with a nonempty word is the last symbol of the nonempty word.  (Contributed by AV, 22-Oct-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 24-Nov-2018.)
statement: lswccatn0lsw $p |- ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V /\ B =/= (/) ) -> ( lastS ` ( A concat B ) ) = ( lastS ` B ) ) $.
